definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: R︰Hold on, Iwill pass you to the human resource department.
sentences.chinese: 等一下，我把您傳到人事部。

sentences.english: Combined with the well-known institutions, the Department of labor and personnel departments cooperation in running schools.
sentences.chinese: 聯合各知名院校，各勞動部門和人事部門合作辦學。

sentences.english: I have been in the business for the last ten years， and worked as the superintendent in the personnel department。
sentences.chinese: 本人在過去十年在商界擔任人事部主任迄今。

sentences.english: Our personnel manager will be in the office tomorrow. Would you like to come tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我們的人事部經理明天會在辦公室，您要明天來嗎？

sentences.english: That person  personally  persuaded the personnel with persuasive words.
sentences.chinese: 那個人用有說服力的話親自說服了人事部門。

sentences.english: I was hired by the Personnel Section.
Organizational and Personnel Department of CAST.
Then I was promoted to the personnel Manager.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我做過公司的人事部經理。

sentences.english: Could you put me through to the personnel department, please?
You can contact the personnal for benefit information.
sentences.chinese: 有關福利方面的情況你可以聯繫人事部。

sentences.english: Well, I have been the director of personnel at Wang’s Lumber for the last five years.
sentences.chinese: 我過去5年在王氏木材公司的人事部門任主管。

sentences.english: But this is something you should discuss with our personnel department.
sentences.chinese: 但你最好與我們的人事部門談論這些事情。

sentences.english: Thanks to the special personnel are audit said, let a person talent loose a tone.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧特殊說人事部正在審覈，讓人人才鬆了一口吻。

sentences.english: Can you connect me with Mr More in the personnel department.
sentences.chinese: 請你給我接通人事部的莫爾先生。

sentences.english: Hes was asked to go to the personnel department for an interview.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求到人事部面試。

sentences.english: The manager of the Personnel Department told us something as to the tips of taking an interview.
sentences.chinese: 人事部經理給我們講了一些有關面試的訣竅。

definition: to accept a job offer/to apply for an advertised position
abbr. of 人力資源|人力资源[ren2 li4 zi1 yuan2]
to hire (an employee)/to accept (a manuscript) for publication
